item.title: 本周是有史以来第一只恐龙命名 200 周年纪念日，这只恐龙改变了古生物学领域：巨龙。

item.title: 长期以来，一年一度的保守派政治行动会议一直是未来总统的试炼场，罗纳德-里根和唐纳德-特朗普等重量级人物的政治抱负都是在这里实现的。
item.description:
The annual Conservative Political Action Conference has long been a proving ground for would-be presidents, launching the political aspirations of heavyweights like Ronald Reagan and Donald Trump.

This year, all eyes were on who should be Trump's VP pick. https://t.co/jgKHTTUOfg pic.twitter.com/zLmNHfhqg8

item.title: 二十多年来，中国首次将大熊猫送往美国，这让圣地亚哥动物园非常高兴，该动物园正准备接收一对大熊猫，其中可能包括该动物园两位前居民的雌性后代。
item.description:
For the first time in more than two decades, China is sending pandas to the U.S. to the delight of the San Diego Zoo, which is preparing to receive a pair that could include a female descendent of two of the zoo's former residents. https://t.co/Soh5FXtuvf

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: 自 1789 年美国参议院成立以来，已有 2000 多人在参议院任职。但只有 12 人是黑人，只有 3 人是黑人女性，而且他们从未一起担任过参议员。
item.description:
More than 2,000 people have served in the U.S. Senate since it was established in 1789. But just 12 have been Black -- and only three have been Black women, none of whom have ever served together.

That could soon change. https://t.co/Wr6Bb7bOU2

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: 尽管多年来一直在使用该技术，但到 2023 年底，美国 48.9 万辆校车中只有不到百分之一是电动的。
item.description:
Despite the availability of the technology all these years, fewer than one percent of the 489,000 school buses in the U.S. were electric at the end of 2023. https://t.co/FzJdPXgURK

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: "每一次损失对我们来说都是巨大的牺牲"。乌克兰总统泽连斯基说，自俄罗斯发动全面入侵以来的两年中，已有3.1万名乌克兰士兵阵亡。
item.description:

item.title: 随着美国共和党提名大局已定，特朗普潜在竞选伙伴的猜测在党内急剧升温--许多主要竞争者齐聚 CPAC，被一些政治观察家视为某种试探。
item.description:
With the GOP nomination all but determined, speculation over Trump's potential running mate is skyrocketing in the party -- and many of the lead contenders gathered at CPAC in what was viewed by some political observers as a tryout of sorts. https://t.co/6RshzA9J0t

item.title: 参议员塔米-达克沃斯（Tammy Duckworth）说 在阿拉巴马州最高法院就胚胎问题做出裁决后 共和党人并没有就她提出的保护试管婴儿法案与她联系"自从阿拉巴马州的裁决后，就一直是蛐蛐在叫"。
item.description:
Sen. Tammy Duckworth said that Republicans haven't reached out to her about her bill to protect IVF after the Alabama Supreme Court ruling on embryos. "It's been crickets since the Alabama ruling." https://t.co/5thXRYfgyC

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: 在这一天：60 年前，穆罕默德-阿里（当时名为卡修斯-克莱）在迈阿密海滩击败桑尼-利斯顿，成为世界重量级拳击冠军。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: 60 years ago, Muhammad Ali (then known as Cassius Clay) became world heavyweight boxing champion as he defeated Sonny Liston in Miami Beach. https://t.co/XftLQWVXO7 pic.twitter.com/stIoZsdYws

item.title: 阳光照射下的瀑布在优胜美地国家公园形成了视觉上的 "火瀑"。夕阳西下时，"火瀑 "现象就会出现，它以合适的角度照射到马尾瀑布上，形成熔岩般的溪流幻觉。
item.description:
A waterfall illuminated by the sun created a visual “firefall" in Yosemite National Park. The "firefall" phenomenon happens when the sun sets and hits Horsetail Fall at the right angle, creating the illusion of a lava-like stream. https://t.co/RXiu4ZesC3 pic.twitter.com/FMeHLFq60o

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: 一项新的研究不仅证实了定期进行体育锻炼可以延长人的寿命和降低死亡风险的已知研究，而且还发现，在运动量较低的情况下，女性从运动中获得的益处比男性更大。
item.description:
A new study not only confirms known research that regular physical activity can prolong life and lower a person's risk of dying, it also finds that women experience greater benefits from exercise than men do, at lower amounts of exercise. https://t.co/P0aRkeq5LG

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: 美国国家运输安全委员会的调查人员称，一架载有尼日利亚最大银行之一首席执行官和其他五人的直升机本月早些时候在南加州莫哈韦沙漠坠毁，留下了一个浅坑。
item.description:

item.title: 埃菲尔铁塔在关闭六天后重新向游客开放，原因是罢工员工要求更好地维护这座历史性地标（铁塔已出现生锈痕迹），并要求涨工资。
item.description:
